info.description:
API para gestión de portafolio de inversiones personales

## Autenticación
Esta API utiliza JWT de Supabase Auth. Incluye el token en el header:
`Authorization: Bearer <tu-token-jwt>`

## Tipos de Activos Soportados
- `stock` - Acciones
- `etf` - Fondos cotizados
- `bond` - Bonos
- `crypto` - Criptomonedas
- `real_estate` - Bienes raíces
- `gold` - Oro
- `cash` - Efectivo
- `other` - Otros
info.title: WealthScope API

post.description: Sends a message to the AI and returns the response
post.summary: Send a message to the AI

get.description: Lists all conversations for the authenticated user
Gets a conversation with all its messages

delete.description: Deletes a conversation and all its messages

get.description: Lists all insights for the authenticated user with optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by category (risk, performance, opportunity, general)
parameters.name: category

get.description: Gets or generates today's daily briefing for the user

post.description: Forces generation of new insights based on current portfolio analysis

get.description: Returns the count of unread insights for the user
Retrieves a specific insight by its ID

put.description: Marks a specific insight as read

post.description: Extract financial assets from a document image using OCR
Confirm and create assets extracted from OCR processing

get.description: Returns historical volatility, drawdown, and other statistics for a symbol
get.summary: Get historical statistics for a symbol

get.description: Returns a list of predefined scenario templates that users can run

post.description: Simulates investment scenarios like buying/selling assets, market movements, or portfolio rebalancing

get.description: Gets a personalized welcome message and conversation starters
Returns a paginated list of assets for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new investment asset for the authenticated user

get.description: Returns a specific asset by its ID

delete.description: Deletes an asset by its ID

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's profile

post.description: Synchronizes user data from Supabase Auth to local database

get.description: Fetch latest financial news with optional filtering by symbols, keywords, language
Search for financial news articles by keywords
Fetch financial news related to a specific stock or crypto symbol
get.summary: Get news for a specific symbol

get.description: Fetch top trending financial news articles
Endpoint simple para verificar conectividad
Retorna análisis de riesgo y alertas de concentración del portafolio
Returns complete portfolio summary with asset type breakdown
Retorna el estado de salud del servicio y la conexión a la base de datos

purchase_price.description: PurchasePrice is the unit price (required, must be non-negative)

quantity.description: Quantity is the number of units (required, must be positive)

assets.description: Assets contains the list of assets to confirm/create

asset_ids.description: AssetIDs contains the IDs of the created assets

created_count.description: CreatedCount is the number of assets successfully created

confidence.description: Confidence is the OCR confidence score (0.0 to 1.0)

name.description: Name is the name of the asset

quantity.description: Quantity is the number of units held

total_value.description: TotalValue is the calculated total value (quantity * price)

assets.description: Assets contains all extracted financial assets

document_type.description: DocumentType identifies the type of document processed

warnings.description: Warnings contains any issues encountered during extraction

message.example: El 45% de tu portafolio está en un solo sector

BearerAuth.description: Ingresa tu JWT token con el prefijo "Bearer ". Ejemplo: "Bearer eyJhbGci..."
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
